description: The object that was changed. In this case, the `account` object.

id.description: Account ID (Unique Identifier) of the Sub Account.

owner_id.description: User ID (Unique Identifier) of the user who owns the Sub Account.

email.description: Email address of the user who owns the Sub Account.

owner_email.description: Email address of the user (owner) whose Sub Account was disassociated.

account_support_email.description: Updated email address for account support.
